song.title: Operation Stealth - The Ballad of J. & J.
song.info:
Here is my second release of year 2006, and, once again, a new tune from a computer game, this game being "Operation Stealth", released as "James Bond: The Stealth Affair" in the US, during the early 90s.
This music is the "underwater theme" of the game, and is mainly inspired by the PC/MS-DOS/AdLib version of the original game soundtrack, although it has also been inspired by the Amiga version.
